mapper.select: select * from agent where num=#{num} and license=#{license}
mapper.insert: insert into agent(num, name, representative, license, address, createdAt) values(#{num}, #{name}, #{representative}, #{license}, #{address}, now())
mapper.update: update agent set name=#{name}, representative=#{representative}, address=#{address}, delflag=0 where num=#{num} and license=#{license}
update agent set report=report+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from (select *, rank() over (order by point desc) as rnk from agent) as temp where num=#{num}
